import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{UserButton,useAuth,useUser}from'@clerk/clerk-react';import ProfileCompletionModal from'./ProfileCompletionModal';import PublicHomePage from'./PublicHomePage';// Mock user profile storage - in real app this would be in a database
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getUserProfile=userId=>{const stored=localStorage.getItem(`userProfile_${userId}`);return stored?JSON.parse(stored):null;};const saveUserProfile=(userId,profile)=>{localStorage.setItem(`userProfile_${userId}`,JSON.stringify(profile));};function App(){const{isSignedIn,isLoaded,userId}=useAuth();const{user}=useUser();const[showProfileModal,setShowProfileModal]=useState(false);const[isProfileComplete,setIsProfileComplete]=useState(false);// Check if user has completed their profile
useEffect(()=>{if(isSignedIn&&isLoaded&&userId){const profile=getUserProfile(userId);if(profile){setIsProfileComplete(true);}else{setShowProfileModal(true);}}},[isSignedIn,isLoaded,userId]);const handleProfileComplete=profileData=>{if(userId){saveUserProfile(userId,profileData);setIsProfileComplete(true);setShowProfileModal(false);}};// Show loading state

return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"min-h-screen bg-black",children:[isSignedIn&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"absolute top-4 right-4 z-10",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UserButton,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PublicHomePage,{}),isSignedIn&&!isProfileComplete&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProfileCompletionModal,{isOpen:showProfileModal,onComplete:handleProfileComplete,clerkUser:user})]});}export default App;
